Package com.intellij.psi

Class PsiReferenceProvider

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intellij.psi.PsiReferenceProvider
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    ArbitraryPlaceUrlReferenceProvider, CustomizingReferenceProvider, DocStringReferenceProvider, DtdReferencesProvider, FilePathReferenceProvider, FixedValuesReferenceProvider, FormReferenceProvider, GenericReferenceProvider, GenericValueReferenceProvider, IdReferenceProvider, IdRefProvider, JavaFxComponentIdReferenceProvider, JavaFxControllerBasedReferenceProvider, JavaFxFileReferenceProvider, JavaFxStaticPropertyReferenceProvider, JsonPointerReferenceProvider, JsonRequiredPropsReferenceProvider, JspxIncludePathReferenceProvider, MicrodataReferenceProvider, PathListReferenceProvider, PrefixReferenceProvider, PropertiesReferenceProvider, PropertiesReferenceProvider, PsiReferenceProviderBase, PythonFormattedStringReferenceProvider, SchemaReferencesProvider, SpockUnrollReferenceProvider, URIReferenceProvider, XmlBaseReferenceProvider, XmlEncodingReferenceProvider, XmlEnumeratedValueReferenceProvider, XmlPrefixReferenceProvider, XsltReferenceProvider

    public abstract class PsiReferenceProvider
extends java.lang.Object
    Allows to inject additional references into an element that supports reference contributors. Register it via PsiReferenceContributor or PsiReferenceProviderBean.EP_NAME Note that, if you're implementing a custom language, it won't by default support references registered through PsiReferenceContributor. If you want to support that, you need to call ReferenceProvidersRegistry.getReferencesFromProviders(PsiElement) from your implementation of PsiElement.getReferences().
